name: games-on-whales
description: WOLF (Whales On Linux Framework) orchestrates Docker containers that simulate Windows gaming environments for Linux. It helps automate game installations via Wine or Proton in self-contained sandboxed setups.
features: Container Orchestration: Automate Docker-based Windows gaming environments with Wine or Proton integration for seamless Linux gameplay.
Game Streaming: Stream Windows games on Linux without dual-boot using self-contained sandboxed setups.
Automated Installation: Simplify game deployment with automated Wine or Proton configurations in isolated containers.
Linux Gaming Framework: Run Windows games natively on Linux through containerized environments with minimal configuration.
Sandbox Environments: Isolate game installations in Docker containers for clean, reproducible gaming setups.
Remote Play Support: Enable remote streaming of Windows games from Linux hosts with low-latency performance.
Proton Integration: Leverage Valve's Proton compatibility layer for enhanced Windows game support on Linux.
Self-Hosted Gaming: Deploy your own game streaming infrastructure without relying on cloud services.
